code: var userService={get:function get(id){return fetch('http://localhost:4000/user/'+id,{method:'GET',credentials:'include'}).then(function(res){return res.json();});},register:function register(data){return fetch("http://localhost:4000/user/register",{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify(data),headers:{'Content-type':'application/json'},credentials:'include'}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(user){return sessionStorage.setItem('user',JSON.stringify(user));});},login:function login(data){return fetch("http://localhost:4000/user/login",{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify(data),headers:{'Content-type':'application/json'},credentials:'include'}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(user){return sessionStorage.setItem('user',JSON.stringify(user));});},logout:function logout(){return fetch("http://localhost:4000/user/logout",{method:'POST',credentials:'include'}).then(function(res){return res.text();}).then(function(){return sessionStorage.clear();});}};export default userService;
